title: Bronze 5 wanting some people who want to work in a team to get out :)
body: Add me if you play afternoon/nights and pretty decent just look for friends who'd like to play together

replies.body: i add u, i am new game but it put me selver 5.

Would this be Duo or Flex?
I'm a B5 too and have been trying to get out (I even started getting coaching lessons). Not to blame teammates (because I know I'm also to blame), but I reckon with consistently good teammates I'll be out in no time.
I play Jg/Mid as an {{champion:28}} {{champion:61}}  two trick.
No such thing as consistently good teammates in bronze btw
im a b1 supp add me ign tm06asf
